column4: a shutdown has resulted in changing my external hard drive to read only..how to fix it?
erm, that isn't a format I don't think
did you pastebin the sudo fdisk -l?
please spare with me my PC turns off automatically
yeah, it is fat32, have you tried fsck'n the drive?
how am i supposed to do it?
I _think_ that you just run `sudo fsck /dev/sdd1`
oh, and make sure the partition is unmounted
give me a minute or so
